attributes.action: legislate to provide for state funding of political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a need, as the recent cash-for-honours row has shown, to remove the perceived connection between political party funding and the granting of honours.

The most obvious way of doing this is by providing political parties with a capped level of state funding. This would prevent the use of slick marketing techniques and facilitate a more honest presentation of policies.
